## tween variable

HOF interpolator. Takes a timing function `f` and interval `[from, to]`<!-- -->. Returns function which takes normalized time as single arg and returns interpolated value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tween: (f: (t: number) => number, from: number, to: number) => (t: number) => number
```
